snippet: The authorities described Alejandro Jiménez González, a Costa Rican, as involved in the "leadership and direction of an organized mafia" engaged in money laundering and other criminal activities throughout Central America.
abstract: The authorities described Alejandro Jiménez González, a Costa Rican, as involved in the "leadership and direction of an organized mafia" engaged in money laundering and other criminal activities throughout Central America.

headline.main: Prime Suspect Arrested in the Killing of Argentine Folk Singer
headline.print_headline: Arrest in Shooting Of Argentine Folk Singer
